site.description: This site will get you the latest updates to the "Open Electribe Editor" program. Please visit http://www.skratchdot.com/projects/open-electribe-editor/ for more info.

category-def.name: open_electribe_editor
category-def.label: Open Electribe Editor
category-def.description: Updates for all the features in the Open Electribe Editor program are contained in this category.
